title: Tasmania is...
creator_credit: Jane Bampton and Tasmanian State Film Unit
brief_description: The activities and scope of the Directorate of Industrial Development and Trade are highlighted. Covers the broad spectrum of industry and looks at the social attitudes held by the Tasmanians themselves.
